sentences.en: A host of problems may delay the opening of the Channel Tunnel.
sentences.cn: 可能推迟英吉利海峡隧道开通的问题一大筐。

sentences.en: Bertha was exasperated at the delay.
sentences.cn: 延误让伯莎十分恼怒。

sentences.en: Can you delay him in some way?
sentences.cn: 你能想办法拖住他一会儿吗？

sentences.en: Don’t delay – send off for the information now.
sentences.cn: 别犹豫——即刻去函索取信息。

sentences.en: He delayed his decision on whether to call an election.
sentences.cn: 在是否宣布举行选举一事上，他推迟作出决定。

sentences.en: He hates delay and procrastination in all its forms.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌任何形式的拖延和耽搁。

sentences.en: I couldn't judge whether the delay was good or bad.
sentences.cn: 我不能断定这样延迟是好还是坏.

sentences.en: Logistical problems may be causing the delay.
sentences.cn: 可能是物流问题造成了延误。

sentences.en: My delay in going abroad is due to my illness.
sentences.cn: 我推迟出国是因为我生病了.

sentences.en: Sorry for the delay, Mr Weaver.
sentences.cn: 韦弗先生，很抱歉耽搁了一些时间。

sentences.en: The announcer apologised for the delay.
sentences.cn: 播报员就晚点表示歉意。

sentences.en: The blizzard forced them to delay their summit bid.
sentences.cn: 暴风雪迫使他们推迟登顶.

sentences.en: The delay is partly explicable by the road works.
sentences.cn: 延误的部份原因是道路施工.

sentences.en: The flight was badly delayed because of fog.
sentences.cn: 该航班因雾而长时间延误。

sentences.en: The laws led to confusion, muddle and years of delay.
sentences.cn: 这些法律导致了困惑、混乱和数年的耽搁。

sentences.en: The time delay would be smaller by eight orders of magnitude.
sentences.cn: 如果按8个数量级来看，延时量会显得小一些。

sentences.en: There can be no excuse for any further delay .
sentences.cn: 没有理由继续拖延。

sentences.en: They claimed that such a delay wouldn't hurt anyone.
sentences.cn: 他们声称这样的延期对谁都不会造成损害。

sentences.en: Trevor Steven entreated them to delay their departure.
sentences.cn: 特雷弗·史蒂文恳求他们晚点走。

sentences.en: We'll send you a quote without delay.
sentences.cn: 我们会立刻送一份报价给你。
